message:
Confirm reasonable bounding box size:
12.65cm, 7.57cm, 14.99cm
Make sure these sizes are within the same order of magnitude you expect from this object IRL.
If the scale is off, please let us know by a factor of how much (for example, 1000 if something
that's supposed to be 1mm is 1m instead) in your complaint note.

Confirm object meta links listed below:
- N/A

Make sure these match mechanisms you expect from this object.

They have now all been set to their upper (maximum) limits.
Verify that these are all the moving parts you expect from this object
and that the joint limits look reasonable.
complaint: the cover needs to be articulated
